Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.description: Update the test cases (to include the expectedMsg) and test code (to check the panic message) here|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/orderer/common/server/main_test.go#L189-L321 to test for the message returned when panic-ing. Otherwise, the tests don't ensure we're panic-ing where we assume we're panic-ing.
